name: Lyrilusc - Recite Starling
desc:
2 or more Level 1 monsters
If this card is Xyz Summoned: You can target 1 face-up monster on the field; it gains 300 ATK and DEF for each Xyz Material currently attached to this card. Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; add 1 Level 1 Winged Beast-Type monster from your Deck to your hand. Any battle damage you take from attacks involving this Xyz Summoned card is also inflicted to your opponent.
